root:
Infobox actor name = Kira Buckland birthdate = birth date1987716mf=y birthplace = [[Anchorage, Alaska]], [[United States|USA]]
'''Kira Buckland''' (b. July 16, 1987) is an [[United States|American]] [[voice actress]].
Kira graduated from [[University of Alaska, Anchorage]], majoring in [[Japanese language|Japanese]]ref name=tosor{{cite web | author= | year= | title=The Official Site of Rina-chan | url=http://suzumiya-haruhi.net/ | work= | accessdate=November 10, 2008}}</ref>. Since winning the [[Anime Expo|Anime Expo 2007]] AX Idol Voice Acting competitionref{{cite web | author=Jonathan Mays| year=2007 | title=Anime Expo 2007: Closing Ceremonies| url=http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/convention/2007/anime-expo/closing-ceremonies | work= | accessdate=May 20, 2008}}</ref> she has been working professionally with [[Bang Zoom! Entertainment]]. Prior to that, she has voiced roles in over 1,000 [[flash animation]]s, [[radio drama]]s, and [[Personal computer game|computer]][[Video game|/video games]] and was the founder of the first Alaskan [[anime convention]] [[Senshi-Con]] based in Anchorage, Alaska.ref{{cite web | author=CJ| year=2006 | title=Senshi-Con 2006: Second Anime Convention held in [[Anchorage]], [[Alaska]]| url=http://www.oxygendeficient.com/Newsbreak/index.php?num=2 | work= | accessdate=May 20, 2008}}</ref>ref{{cite web|author=Aaron Burkhart |url=http://media.www.thenorthernlight.org/media/storage/paper960/news/2006/03/14/Features/Anime.Club.Organizes.First.Campus.Convention-2542430.shtml |title= Anime Club expands this year's Senshi-Con with more events, guest|accessdate=2008-11-27 |work=The Northern Light |publisher= |date=2006-03-14 }}</ref>. She started voice acting in 2004 on various online websites, under the well-known alias of "Rina-chan". In February 2009, Kira returned to [[Senshi-Con]] as a guest.
==Filmography== The following list contains some selected rolesref name=tosorref{{cite web | author= | year= | title=Kira Buckland: IMDB Profile | url=http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2299231/ | work= | accessdate=September 13, 2008}}</ref>ref{{cite web | author= | year= | title=Kira Buckland at Voice123 | url=http://voice123.com/kirabuckland | work= | accessdate=September 13, 2008}}</ref>; a longer list is located [http://suzumiya-haruhi.net/experience.html here]. ===Anime, TV and Film Roles=== * ''[[5 Centimeters Per Second]] '' - Kanae Sumida (Bang Zoom!) * ''[[AIKa R-16: Virgin Mission]]'' - '''Eri Shingai''' * ''[[Xombie]]: Dead on Arrival'' - '''Zoe''' * ''[[Moribito: Guardian of the Spirit]]'' - '''Nimka''' (episodes 18-19) * ''[[Tweeny Witches]]'' - '''Additional Voices''' * ''3-Pang Fighter'' - '''Mikka''' * ''[[Good Game#Cross Seasons|Gamer Tonight]]'' - '''Amber Jaymon''' (Girl Gamer episode)
===Video Game Roles=== * ''[[Castle Crashers]]'' - '''Medusa''', '''Princess Voices''' * ''[[AWAY Shuffle Dungeon]]'' - '''Various Voices''' * ''[[Luminous Arc 2]]'' - '''Karen'''ref{{cite web | author=Raychul | year=2008 | title=GameGirl: Interview with Kira "Rina-Chan" | url=http://www.gamegirl.com/article/105069/interview-with-kira-rina-chan/ | work= | accessdate=November 27, 2008}}</ref>, '''Elicia''' * ''[[Neverland Card Battles]]'' - '''Refina''' * ''[[Brigade E5: New Jagged Union]]'' - '''Saki Sato''' * ''The White Chamber'' - '''Sarah''' * ''Agent Scarecrow'' - '''Stewardess''' * [http://www.godlimations.com ''Trapped'' / ''Pursuit'' / ''Escape''] - '''Dialla''' * ''Jack French'' - '''Lucy''', '''Lab Tech'''
==References== Reflist
